p: For the detection of colony number, 3 g of sample was transferred to a high-pressure conical flask containing 30 mL of sterile distilled water and homogenized for 15 min, and 200 Î¼L of serial diluent was added to plate count agar (PCA) medium to determine the colony number. When the plate was covered with A. flavus and could not be counted, 60 colonies were recorded ( Tang et al., 2018).
